snippet: McCURDY--Rev. William J.,S.J., on February 28, 2016. Beloved brother of Walter McCurdy, Richard McCurdy and Irene Hanratty. Reposing at the Murray-Weigel Hall Chapel, 515 East Fordham Rd., Bronx, NY, on Friday, 3-5 and 7-8:30pm. Funeral Mass at the Murray-Weigel Hall Chapel, Saturday, 11:30am. Interment at the Jesuit Cemetery, Auriesville, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Northeast Province of the Society of Jesus, 39 E. 83rd St., New York, NY 10028. For information, contact Farenga Bros., Inc., Directors (718) 654-0500. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCCURDY, REV. WILLIAM J.
